attributes.action: Allow long covid/ long haul suffers get paid fall pay
attributes.additional_details: Making a furlough package to support people with Long covid/ Long haul
attributes.background: I and many other are currently suffering from long covid I want the government to pay full pay when I’ll from work as if not there fault or some sort of furlough

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581110
